name: Super Santa VS Alien Swarm
description:
It is up to Santa to take on the invading alien scum that threaten to ruin Christmas! Blast the aliens into galactic goo with a good ol' dose of Holiday Magic! Santa is out for vengence on this not-so silent night...

Super Santa VS Alien Swarm, a fun holiday reskin of our GBJAM game, is a simple endless shooter where your goal is to see how high a score you can get. Just think, the higher the score you make, the happier the children that didn't get consumed by the alien's you managed to defeat will be. :D It's really the gift that keeps on giving so feel free to share Super Santa with your friends!!! Yes, it's free, but it's the thought that counts. ;)

SPACE BAR - START GAME, XMAS MAGIC BLAST
ARROW KEYS - MOVE SANTA IN DIRECTION PRESSED

The further you get and the more you retry, the tougher each session gets! Press F8 During GAMEPLAY or on the GAME OVER SCREEN to reset the difficulty and start anew.

SQUIDDIES = 10pts
ASTROSQUIDS = 15pts
SCOUT SHIPS = 25pts
*MOTHER SHIP = INDESTRUCTABLE & INSTA-DEATH UPON TOUCHING!!!

HAPPY HOLIDAYS TO ALL OF YOU FROM ALL OF US HERE AT GPAC!!!

Other GPAC Titles:

WAR for the White House
INFEST:STATION Endless Swarm
